word: "MOTHER'S CONTACT WITH EUROPEAN PEOPLE HAD BROUGHT TO HER MIND SCORES OF THINGS THAT HAD BEEN PRESENTED TO HER IN VISION DURING PAST YEARS, SOME OF THEM TWO OR THREE TIMES, AND OTHER SCENES MANY TIMES. HER SEEING OF HISTORIC PLACES AND HER CONTACT WITH THE PEOPLE REFRESHED HER MEMORY WITH REFERENCE TO THESE THINGS, AND SO SHE DESIRED TO ADD MUCH MATERIAL TO THE BOOK. THIS WAS DONE, AND THE MANUSCRIPTS WERE PREPARED FOR TRANSLATION.
